title: Brussels Sprouts and Bacon Covered in Melted Gorgonzola
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Brussels Sprouts and Bacon Covered in Melted Gorgonzolan a try. This recipe makes 4 servings with 120 calories, 7g of protein, and 7g of fat each. For $1.01 per serving, this recipe covers 16% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe is liked by 1 foodies and cooks. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and primal diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. If you have bacon, brussels sprouts, salt and pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 61%. This score is solid. Try Penne Rigate with Brussels Sprouts and Gorgonzola, Orecchiette With Brussels Sprouts, Gorgonzola, And Brown-butter, and Shredded Brussels Sprouts & Kale Salad with Apple, Gorgonzola & Candied Pecans for similar recipes.
instructions: Directions:1. Cook the bacon in a pan and set aside reserving 1 tablespoon of the bacon grease.2. Add the brussels sprouts to the pan, season with salt and pepper and saute for a minute.3. Remove from heat and mix in the gorgonzola.

steps.step: Cook the bacon in a pan and set aside reserving 1 tablespoon of the bacon grease.
Add the brussels sprouts to the pan, season with salt and pepper and saute for a minute.
Remove from heat and mix in the gorgonzola.
